channel.title: DLing music
channel.description:
MY friend had just sent me 2.9 gigs of songs and I downloaded them fine, put them in iTunes, and tried to sync them on to my iPod. Thing is, these exclamation points appeared next to the songs and it said they couldn't be transferred to the iPod because they couldn't be found, although the folder holding all 2.9 gigs of the songs is sitting right here on my desktop.
Help?

item.title: DLing music
item.dc:creator: @Chimaera_God Chimaera God
item.description:
@Chimaera_God wrote:

^^ Did that, then realized I had to have the folders open so my computer would be able to locate the file.

Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: DLing music
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

Try deleting them all off iTunes then putting them all back on again.

Read full topic
